fields.name: version
fields.doc: Questionnaire version useful to support possible update

fields.name: startTime
fields.doc: timestamp in UTC (s) when the question is shown

fields.name: endTime
fields.doc: timestamp in UTC (s)  when the question is answered

fields.name: startTime
fields.doc: timestamp in UTC (s) when the questionnaire is submitted to the subject

fields.name: endTime
fields.doc: timestamp in UTC (s) when the questionnaire is sent out to the platform
